value_claims.claim_title: AI-Rad Companion provides additional security for radiologists
value_claims.claim_description: Radiologist using AI-Rad Companion Chest CT in clinical practice reports that the algorithm provides a sense of additional security, indicating trust in the AI system for diagnostic support.
value_claims.source_quote: Meanwhile I really trust the algorithm. It gives me a sense of additional security., states Dr. med. Martin Reiss-Zimmermann, Radiology Erfurt, Germany, who is using the AI-Rad Companion Chest CT in clinical practice.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Radiologist directly attributes sense of security and trust to the AI-Rad Companion algorithm in clinical use

value_claims.claim_description: The AI-Rad Companion family supports automated post-processing of MRI, CT and X-ray datasets, saving clinicians' time through automation of routine tasks.
value_claims.source_quote: The AI-Rad Companion family supports radiologists, radiation oncologists, radiotherapists and medical physicists through automated post processing of MRI, CT and X-ray datasets. It saves the clinicians' time
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time savings directly attributed to automated post-processing capabilities of AI-Rad Companion

value_claims.claim_description: AI-Rad Companion helps clinicians increase their diagnostic precision through automated post-processing support for radiology examinations.
value_claims.source_quote: The AI-Rad Companion family supports radiologists, radiation oncologists, radiotherapists and medical physicists through automated post processing of MRI, CT and X-ray datasets. It saves the clinicians' time and helps them to increase their diagnostic precision.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI helps increase precision but does not fully automate diagnostic decision-making; augments clinician capabilities

value_claims.claim_title: ISI reduces MRI workflow steps by one third
value_claims.claim_description: The Imaging System Interface (ISI) saves time and improves operational efficiency by reducing the number of steps in the MRI workflow by one third, allowing users to focus more on patients.
value_claims.source_quote: The Imaging System Interface1 (ISI) saves time, improves operational efficiency and reduces the number of steps in the MRI workflow by one third, allowing the user to focus more on the patient
value_claims.attribution_evidence: ISI is a hardware/software interface for synchronization; AI not explicitly mentioned as core mechanism

context_claims.claim_description: Siemens Healthineers operates in the healthcare sector, specifically in medical imaging and diagnostics including radiology, CT, MRI, and X-ray systems.
context_claims.source_quote: Siemens Healthineers develops AI-powered healthcare technology that transforms patient outcomes. From AI in patient care to procedure automation and digital health

context_claims.claim_description: AI-Rad Companion provides clinical decision-making support for radiologists, radiation oncologists, radiotherapists and medical physicists through automated post-processing.
context_claims.source_quote: The AI-Rad Companion product family supports customers in their daily routine of clinical decision-making

context_claims.claim_description: AI-Rad Companion product family was announced and expanded between 2018-2020, with various modules for Chest CT, Brain MR, Prostate MR, and Chest X-ray introduced during this period.
AI-Rad Companion addresses challenges of rising radiology examinations, staff shortages, limited time per case, and increasing danger of missing clinically relevant findings.
context_claims.source_quote: The steady rise of radiology examinations and staff shortages lead to a limited amount of time per case as well as an increasing danger of missing clinically relevant findings.

context_claims.claim_description: Product family includes multiple modules: Chest CT, Brain MR for Morphometry Analysis, Prostate MR for Biopsy Support, and Chest X-ray for clinical decision support across different imaging modalities.
context_claims.source_quote: The AI-Rad Companion product family supports customers in their daily routine of clinical decision-making. Newest additions to the family are solutions for post-processing of X-ray images and organ contouring for radiation therapy planning

context_claims.claim_description: AI-Rad Companion Chest CT is being used in clinical practice at Radiology Erfurt, Germany, representing real-world deployment.
context_claims.source_quote: Dr. med. Martin Reiss-Zimmermann, Radiology Erfurt, Germany, who is using the AI-Rad Companion Chest CT in clinical practice.

context_claims.claim_description: AI-Rad Companion applications are available on teamplay, the cloud-based healthcare platform from Siemens Healthineers, enabling scalable deployment.
context_claims.source_quote: Both new applications can be used on MRI scanners from different manufacturers and are available on teamplay2, the cloud-based healthcare platform from Siemens Healthineers.

context_claims.claim_description: Digital ECR 2020 and product developments occurred during COVID-19 pandemic, with focus on efficiency during critical demand, recovery and operating with COVID-19.
context_claims.source_quote: Our aim is to help provide better outcomes and increased efficiency, during times of critical demand, recovery and (the new) normalization of operating with COVID-19.
